summary: Provides utilities to convert OpenAI‑style chat/completion payloads into the request format required by Gemini (Vertex AI/Google AI Studio), handling message history, system prompts, image data, MIME type detection, tool call translation, and request header preparation for both synchronous and asynchronous calls.
business_intent: Allow Litellm to interface with Gemini models by automatically translating user‑provided OpenAI‑compatible inputs into Gemini‑compatible API requests, ensuring seamless cross‑model integration and consistent usage across different LLM providers.
